alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 2:18PM CST until March 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Adams and Concordia Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY, MARCH 16 TO WEDNESDAY, MARCH 22... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From Thursday, March 16 to Wednesday, March 22. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 43.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday, March 16 to a crest of 48.5 feet Sunday, March 19. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 43.4 Mon 2 pm CST 43.8 44.3 44.8 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 7 PM CST.
